mapper.sql: id as id, odo_id as odoId, is_vas_success as isVasSuccess, vas_error_code as vasErrorCode, is_tsp_success as isTspSuccess, tsp_error_code as tspErrorCode, is_waybill_code_success as isWaybillCodeSuccess, waybill_code_error_code as waybillCodeErrorCode, ou_id as ouId
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_odo_transport_service SET odo_id = #{odoId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , is_vas_success = #{isVasSuccess,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , vas_error_code = #{vasErrorCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_tsp_success = #{isTspSuccess,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , tsp_error_code = #{tspErrorCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_waybill_code_success = #{isWaybillCodeSuccess,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , waybill_code_error_code = #{waybillCodeErrorCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId}
